attributes.action: FREE BUS TICKETS FOR STUDENTS IN BRISTOL
attributes.additional_details: The students of Bristol should receive the privilege of free bus fares. With the continuous rise in student accommodation prices and the recent rise in tuition fees, we believe that Bristol City Council should counteract the exploitation of students by offering them the benefit of free local transportation.
attributes.background: Are you sick of paying extortionate bus fares to get to and from University, as well as day to day activities? THEN SIGN THIS PETITION!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of Bristol City Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: http://epetitions.bristol.gov.uk/epetition_core/
